message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I see the value you'd gain, $15,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?
I understand you were willing to meet me at $17,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. Would you be willing to meet me at $16,250?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $16,875?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $16,500?
